reviewText: Mencia is hilarious but his content is too racially focused and that gets old quick. Even though most of it tends to be true, and therefore funny, it would be nice if he actually had jokes that weren't about whites, blacks, and hispanics.
Title: Carlos Mencia in: The Best of Funny is Funny

reviewText: This is a great dvd for any Mencia fan. It contains his earlier work as a host for a tv show, where he started to refine his comedy presentation.  A must for your Mencia Comedy Collection.
Title: Carlos Mencia in: The Best of Funny is Funny

reviewText: Carlos Mencia is the biggest joke thief alive.  I saw him live many times when i used to work at a comedy club, as well as a few episodes of his show, caught bits and pieces of his specials, and even this turd of a video.  I'm sure he must have SOME original ideas, but soooo much of it is stolen from other comics.In addition, you get lectured like a 5-year old.  I really get tired of him telling me that if i'm not laughing, it's because i'm AFRAID to laugh.  Ummmm.....no.  I'm not laughing because it's not funny. Or i've heard it before, and his delivery is so forceful, he squeezes the funny out of what little was there to begin with.  I'm not offended by ANYTHING he has ever said, except offended for knowing his jokes are lifted, and he's trying to pass them off as his own.  I love really racy, raunchy, rude comedy.  But Carlos just doesn't have the talent.The number of comics i've seen call him on thievery should shame him, but it doesn't.  It you want to see something ORIGINAL, try Richard Pryor, Dave Attell, George Lopez, or even Gabriel Iglesias.  Heck, even Paul Mooney.  He may start a race war, but he's darn funny.
Title: Carlos Mencia in: The Best of Funny is Funny

reviewText: My cousin introduced me to a CD of Carlos Mencia; I didn't pay much attention to it.  I got a new car and received XM Radio.  I found the comedy channel and there he was.  I loved it so I had to order this DVD.  It's great.  If you like to laugh at everything, buy this DVD.
Title: Carlos Mencia in: The Best of Funny is Funny

reviewText: Carlos Mencia tells it like it is in his own hilarious style. If you like stand up, this is a great addition to your collection
Title: Carlos Mencia in: The Best of Funny is Funny

reviewText: some very funny moments but overall it's not great -- but worth a non dedicated watch (e.g. when playing guitar)he's cool though.
Title: Carlos Mencia in: The Best of Funny is Funny
